title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/sparrow_bankole.html
notes:
be there more to come? not likely!


scamorama

messages.body:
Wed, 30 Mar 2005  
princebankole100@netscape.net   
Undisclosed-recipients@, @      
PRINCE BANKOLE MANAGER BIAO BANK.ABDIJAN        

PRINCE BANKOLE
MANAGER BIAO BANK.ABDIJAN
COTE d' IVOIRE(IVOIRY COAST).

ATTN:MD/CEO. MY DEAR,
I am pleased to get across to you for a very urgent know you neither have I seen you before but I got your contact through the Ivoirian chamber of commerce and industries. I am the manager of MANAGER,MANAGER BIAO BANK.ABDIJAN , COTE D' IVOIRE. The intended business is thus, We had a customer, a Foreigner (a GERMAN CITIZEN) resident in Abidjan, he was a Contractor with one of the government parastatals. He had in his account in my branch the sum of US$11.5 Million {Eleveen Million five hundred U.S. Dollars).Unfortunately, the man died four years ago until today non of his next of kin has come Forward to claim the money. Having noticed this, I in collaboration with two other top officials of the bank have covered the account all this while.


Now I want you (being a foreigner) to be fronted as one of his next of kin and forward your account and other relevant documents to be advised to you by us to attest to the Claim. We will use our positions to get all internal documentations to back up the claims. The whole procedures will last only ten working days to get the fund retrieved successfully without trace even in future. Your response is only what we are waiting for as we have arranged all necessary things. As soon as this message comes to you kindly get back to me indicating your interest.

Then I will furnish you with the whole procedures to ensure that the deal is successfully Concluded. For your assistance we have agreed to give you thirty percent (30%) of the total sum at the end of the transaction. It is risk free and a big fortune for both of us. With your maximum co-operation, this transaction is not expected to last for more than 10 working days.

All correspondence towards this transaction will be through,telephone
and
fax.
I await your earliest response through my alterntive
mail(princebankole100@yahoo.fr)
Thanks,
Yours Sincerely,
bankole prince
messages.raw:
Prince Bankole

messages.body:
Wed, 30 Mar 2005

Prince Bankole,

Are you sure this is safe?  Please clarify your position related to this
money. You say you are "the manager of MANAGER,MANAGER BIAO", what is
that?  Are there three of you?

And don't call me MY DEAR.

Jack Sparrow
messages.raw:
Jack is confused and uncertain. Wants clarification.

Jack Sparrow

Wed, 30 Mar 2005

Prince Bankole,

Are you sure this is safe? Please clarify your position related to this money. You say you are "the manager of MANAGER,MANAGER BIAO", what is that? Are there three of you?

And don't call me MY DEAR.

Jack Sparrow

messages.body:
Thu, 31 Mar 2005   
"prince bankole" <princebankole100@yahoo.fr>
   
Dear Friend Jack Sparrow 
Dear Friend Jack Sparrow
 
I do appreciate your kind reply which simply depict your level of
maturity,transparency and simplicity.This transaction is not a joke
neither is a childs play, l do have the document than true information
of the deceased which l gethered from our bank for my own usage and as
to achive my aims and objective,depending on your seriousness and
sincereity, l clearly direct you on how this transaction will be done
safetly.As i told you i am the manage in this branch of the bank were
this money is deposited.coacody branch here in Abidjan Cote D'IVOIRE
Note:In our bank, this fund has lasted more than the expected period
because we are interested and have taken our time and necessary steps to
be sure no one comes for it. It is as well as forgotten funds(lying
Dormant in the suspense account of the deceased for years). which can be
send to the government safe treasure as an unclaim fund, since nobody
come's for it till date. Naturally you need some time like this to set
for a limit of an experimental error. This is why it is till today. This
transaction is something that we want to do without any trace's and
should be kept confidential between you and l. l like my honourable jobs
of confidence as a banker. l would like to leave the job on my own out
of personal volution and not to be handled as disdents. 
The nature of the transaction in details: 
I am still member and staff of the bank panel that will be charged to
investigate the whole process of this inheritance fund transfer, with
the personal information that you will give us. l do not want to have
any hitch in this transaction as a result of delays and in the process
put USD11.5m at stake. l have been in the banking profession for 16
years and know what can make a transaction of this kind to backfire, but
l can assure for one that this transaction is 100% risk free, This will
mean toying with my career which l don't want.
As you assure me that you will help, then l have forward to you a text
of application which you will return back to the bank and Soon as your
application is received, it will be processed and you will in turn
receive your acknowledgement letter from the bank showing the receipt of
your application.  The bank will stipulate in the acknowledgement letter
the conditions with which this fund shall be swift transferred to your
designated account in your country or as the case may be. Now I think
everything is veryclear. We are only interested in getting the
transaction successfully concluded. 
My Word: This transaction is risk free and will never involve any one
along the line if only you are ready to follow my guidelines. Do not
reply any letter to the bank without sending me a copy of such letter
for a review to avoid mistakes that may affect this transaction. All you
need to do is to understand that the watchword is confidentiality and
trust. Do not expose this to friends to protect this transaction from
suffering a hitch anywhere along the line, everything is legal and will
be legally done. The attorney will get all the fund transfer approval
documents legally to effect the transfer.There is nothing different from
the normal bank fund transfer proccedure.
The only difference is that we are going to change the particulars of
the next of kin who is late and any person can stand for this claim. l
am 100% sure because l have carried out series of investigations
concerning this fund and discovered that except l move it out, it will
be furfitted to the government as unclaimed bills. So do not be afraid.
All l need is your maximium cooperation and maturity to see that we
finally smile together as one in  few days from now.instructed above. 
Brief information about the late Mr.ADOLF SPEAR thus:
1- Name of father: Mr. Michael SPEAR
2- Name of mother: Mrs. Grace SPEAR.
3- Nationality of parents: Germany.
4- Name of wife: Mrs Tina SPEAR.
5- Name of son: Mr. Jerry SPEAR.
6-Name of daughter: Miss Doris SPEAR.
2. Account information:
Name of Bank: BIAO BANK.
Account number: BIAO CI. 212298AC
Type of Account: suspense.
Date of Opening of the account: 16/09/92.
Amount involved at the moment: USD 11.5Million.
Source of fund: General Contracts
Trade (Import and Export).
Name of Company: STE ADOLF & BROTHERS SARL.
Date of registration: 4/01/92.
Referees in the bank:
1- CHIDEK INVESTMENT COMPANY ABIDJAN.
2- WATACO WESTAFRICA SARL ABIDJAN.
Next of kin:  ( cousin ).
l have studied this transaction before going into it, Believe that there
is no problem otherwise l wouldn't have been involved. The nationality
of the next of kin was not disclosed in the information with the bank,
so it is not subject to sex or nationality.You may be a man or a woman
and may come from any foreign country around the world. It is true the
late Mr.SPEAR, was a German national but can have his cousin any where
in the world. A cousin may be parentenal or maternal. 
All what the bank wants is to have his information which I included in
this mail send to you to get
attached to your application because it is impossible for the wrong
person to have it. You have it now because we are interested and thereby
got it out for you. 
Finally the only thing is to keep this transaction secret, do all what
the bank asks you to do at the right time, and always be in constant
communication with me for advice before you answer any thing from the
bank. 
I assure you that the ten banking days will look like ten banking hours.
Please do not be afraid. That was why I gave you every information about
the late Mr.SPEAR. You mustn't need to be the real heir in this
situation. All l need is to use your contact as a foreign partner. The
only difference is that you have to change the name of the next of kin
to your own name. Every other necessary proof that is needed will e
arranged here in the bank. This will enable us conclude this transaction
shortly.
Please remember to keep everything to yourself as confidentiality is the
only key to this expected
success. I decided to give everything to you to enable you be well
informed and act accordingly. I shall be lad to answer any question(s)
as required. 
I am 100% ready to work with you ,you can as well call me through this
my bank line tomorrow morning 00225.0584.4089
Please mail me as soon as you go through this mail.May God bless you and
your family. We shall soon meet in persons. 

Regards,
prince bankole
messages.raw:
Prince pretty much ignores Jack's response email (which is typical) and launches in to What Must Be Done...

Prince Bankole

"prince bankole" <princebankole100@yahoo.fr>

Account number: BIAO CI. 212298AC
Type of Account: suspense.
Date of Opening of the account: 16/09/92.
Amount involved at the moment: USD 11.5Million.
Source of fund: General Contracts
Trade (Import and Export).
Name of Company: STE ADOLF & BROTHERS SARL.
Date of registration: 4/01/92.
Referees in the bank:
1- CHIDEK INVESTMENT COMPANY ABIDJAN.
2- WATACO WESTAFRICA SARL ABIDJAN.
Next of kin: ( cousin ).
l have studied this transaction before going into it, Believe that there is no problem otherwise l wouldn't have been involved. The nationality of the next of kin was not disclosed in the information with the bank, so it is not subject to sex or nationality.You may be a man or a woman and may come from any foreign country around the world. All what the bank wants is to have his information which I included in this mail send to you to get attached to your application because it is impossible for the wrong person to have it. You have it now because we are interested and thereby got it out for you.
Finally the only thing is to keep this transaction secret, do all what the bank asks you to do at the right time, and always be in constant communication with me for advice before you answer any thing from the bank.
I assure you that the ten banking days will look like ten banking hours. Please do not be afraid. That was why I gave you every information about the late Mr.SPEAR. The only difference is that you have to change the name of the next of kin to your own name. Every other necessary proof that is needed will e arranged here in the bank. This will enable us conclude this transaction shortly.
Please remember to keep everything to yourself as confidentiality is the only key to this expected success. I decided to give everything to you to enable you be well informed and act accordingly. I shall be lad to answer any question(s) as required.
I am 100% ready to work with you ,you can as well call me through this my bank line tomorrow morning 00225.0584.4089
Please mail me as soon as you go through this mail.May God bless you and your family. We shall soon meet in persons.

Regards,
prince bankole

messages.body:
Thu, 31 Mar 2005

We certainly do not want this money going to the government.  Any
government.  What a waste.  You and I know better how to spend this
money, I am sure.

So, let's go for it.

I am a sailor of sorts; at least I make my living at sea doing "salvage"
operations.  Phone access is sometimes problematic.  I do have a land
line, but my access to it is sporadic.

Aargh,
Jack
messages.raw:
OK, Jack will play along.

Jack Sparrow

Thu, 31 Mar 2005

We certainly do not want this money going to the government. Any government. What a waste. You and I know better how to spend this money, I am sure.

So, let's go for it.

I am a sailor of sorts; at least I make my living at sea doing "salvage" operations. Phone access is sometimes problematic. I do have a land line, but my access to it is sporadic.

Aargh,
Jack

messages.body:
Fri, 1 Apr 2005

   
Dear Friend Jack Sparrow 

Dear Friend Forever Aargh Jack

see as I told you early that i am still Staff of this bank and I do not
want anybody to know that i am
involve in this transfer of this money and I do not want any thing that
will lead to trace so that i can
not loose my job as the manager of this bank,

I have see the way this is going to work out as so as you submit the
form my bank here will aprove this money in your favour and and they
will have to asign to you the accredited attorney of this bank who will
help you obtain the necessary document for this transfer and as soon as
you finish with the attorney and the attorney get the three document for
the transfer, 

I think that trust is the foundation of any perfect partnership.

That is why i sending my last mail along with a copy of my pictures i
take few today and here is the
document that covers the money in this our bank i have forwarded it to
you in my  mail.here i am expecting yours picture.
Regarding the transaction,the most important thing is confidentiality,
you can easily guess that if the bank knows my involvement that will
jeopardize the transaction and i will lose my position in the
bank,that is why the bank does not have to know that i am the one
feeding you with the informations these funds.

You have to be very careful with people around you because you can never
know who among your friends is against your success. I am a believer and
i believe that God is the one who joined you and me to champion this
transaction. Noboby except you is aware of this transaction because i do
not believe in people around me.

I,in the bank will be backing your claim secretly in order for the bank
to approve the said claim and
transfer the funds into your nominated bank account.As soon as the bank
transfers the funds into your account i will take the next available
flight to come over there in your country for the share

I would also like you to call me on my direct line so that we can talk
deeply regarding this transaction here is my number 00-225-0584-4089 .

just fill free it do as I instruct you this money well be transfered to
the account you will prove in this
form ok. please call me so that we talk .

Best regards
Prince bankole


Here is the Application letter.

THE TEXT OF THE APPLICATION TO BE FILLED AND SENT TO THE BANK BY FAX OR
EMAIL OF THE BANK Fax: 00225.22425049.Email:biaobank_ci@mail2banker.com
messages.raw:
Prince says "send your contact info to me, and contact the bank!" And don't worry, just TRUST me!



[cut from a magazine? annual report?
There was also a standard Lad-grade 'bank certificate of deposit' 'document'.]

Prince Bankole

Fri, 1 Apr 2005

Dear Friend Jack Sparrow

Dear Friend Forever Aargh Jack

see as I told you early that i am still Staff of this bank and I do not want anybody to know that i am involve in this transfer of this money and I do not want any thing that will lead to trace so that i can not loose my job as the manager of this bank,

I have see the way this is going to work out as so as you submit the form my bank here will aprove this money in your favour and and they will have to asign to you the accredited attorney of this bank who will help you obtain the necessary document for this transfer and as soon as you finish with the attorney and the attorney get the three document for the transfer,

I think that trust is the foundation of any perfect partnership.

That is why i sending my last mail along with a copy of my pictures i take few today and here is the document that covers the money in this our bank i have forwarded it to you in my mail.here i am expecting yours picture.

Regarding the transaction,the most important thing is confidentiality, you can easily guess that if the bank knows my involvement that will jeopardize the transaction and i will lose my position in the bank,that is why the bank does not have to know that i am the one feeding you with the informations these funds.

You have to be very careful with people around you because you can never know who among your friends is against your success. I am a believer and i believe that God is the one who joined you and me to champion this transaction. Noboby except you is aware of this transaction because i do not believe in people around me.

I,in the bank will be backing your claim secretly in order for the bank to approve the said claim and transfer the funds into your nominated bank account.As soon as the bank transfers the funds into your account i will take the next available flight to come over there in your country for the share

I would also like you to call me on my direct line so that we can talk deeply regarding this transaction here is my number 00-225-0584-4089 .

just fill free it do as I instruct you this money well be transfered to the account you will prove in this form ok. please call me so that we talk .

Best regards
Prince bankole

Here is the Application letter.

THE TEXT OF THE APPLICATION TO BE FILLED AND SENT TO THE BANK BY FAX OR EMAIL OF THE BANK
Fax: 00225.22425049.Email:biaobank_ci@mail2banker.com

Full Name:
Full Address:
Telephone :
Fax :
E-mail :

ATTN: DR.J.C.BAPOUR,
Director of Operations Remittance Department,
Biao Abidjan Cote D'Ivoire.
Une Nouvelle Maniere De Vivre La Banque.
["A new way of living the bank" (??)"]
Fax: 00225.22425049.

Dear Sir,

APPLICATION FOR THE TRANSFER OF USD11.500.000.00 Million (ELEVEN MILLION FIVE HUNDRED THOUSAND UNITED STATES DOLLARS) FROM ACCOUNT NUMBER: BIAO CI: 212298 AC.TO A NEW ACCOUNT AS WILL BE DETAILED BELOW

MY BANK NAME IS =============================
MY BANK ADDRESS IS=============================
MY ACCOUNT NUMBER IS=========================
SWIFT CODE IS=================================
BANK TELEPHONE================================
BANK FAX=====================================

This is the money left behind in your bank by my Deceased cousin, Mr.ADOLF SPEAR who died at the World Trade Centre, following the attack in New York and Washington on the 11th September 2001 with his entire family. He was a German national, he owned Ste ADOLF & Brothers Sarl IMPORT AND EXPORT ABIDJAN (Cote d'Ivoire)

I am his next of kin with all Documents of proof. I wish as his heir apparent to Claim and instruct that the above-mentioned amount be Transferred into my nominated account as shown above. I shall bear the cost of fund transfer. Please accept This late application, as it was due to family Logistic problems consequent upon his funeral rites.

I hope you will expedite action.

Thanks for your cooperation.
Yours faithfully,

Name and signature

messages.body:
Fri, 1 Apr 2005



Dear Prince, 

I am encouraged by your quick learning concerning the ways of salvage
agents in the Caribbean. I operate as a sailor strictly for myself, and
report to no one.  Salvage has been a profitable venture for me, and my
ship, the Black Pearl, is one of the best afloat (at least I believe
so). I can spend many weeks with a small crew sailing from one place to
another.  Some say I lead a "colorful" life. Some are put off by my
appearance and lifestyle. I just know that I am happy.  I have attached
a picture of myself, as you requested.

Confidentiality is indeed the watchword. This adventure will be as
silent and closed as the wind. 

Aargh,
Jack
messages.raw:
Jack sends his picture to Prince. Note this picture is of Johnny Depp as Jack Sparrow.
Not a character I would be comfortable doing business with.



Jack Sparrow

Fri, 1 Apr 2005

Dear Prince,

I am encouraged by your quick learning concerning the ways of salvage agents in the Caribbean. I operate as a sailor strictly for myself, and report to no one. Salvage has been a profitable venture for me, and my ship, the Black Pearl, is one of the best afloat (at least I believe so). I can spend many weeks with a small crew sailing from one place to another. Some say I lead a "colorful" life. Some are put off by my appearance and lifestyle. I just know that I am happy. I have attached a picture of myself, as you requested.

Confidentiality is indeed the watchword. This adventure will be as silent and closed as the wind.

Aargh,
Jack

Dear Friend Jack Sparrow

Thanks for your mail .Now please fill the form submit it to the bank for

form ok
i wait to receive your application in our bank ok 
thanks and remain bless.
prince

thanks and remain bless.
prince

messages.body:
Sun, 3 Apr 2005   
   
To "prince bankole"   

 
Prince, Me Matey,

I was trusting you because you showed knowledge and sympathy with the
special way of the Caribbean salvage people.  Please, to show your
friendship and develop my trust, use the special greetings and terms of
our organization.  Always greet me and refer to me as "Me Matey", or
"Matey" or "Mate".  We also sign our letters or say goodbye with
"Aargh", which means essentially "easy sailing".

Aargh,
Jack
messages.raw:
Jack wants Prince to use pirate-speak when talking to him.

Jack Sparrow

Sun, 3 Apr 2005

To "prince bankole"

Prince, Me Matey,

I was trusting you because you showed knowledge and sympathy with the special way of the Caribbean salvage people. Please, to show your friendship and develop my trust, use the special greetings and terms of our organization. Always greet me and refer to me as "Me Matey", or "Matey" or "Mate". We also sign our letters or say goodbye with "Aargh", which means essentially "easy sailing".

Aargh,
Jack

messages.body:
Sun, 3 Apr 2005
 
Prince me matey,

I do not feel I can continue this patch unless I have a true partner. 
Me Matey is a greeting which we Caribbean sailors use for close friends
and crew, and "Aargh" can be used in many ways, including goodbye,
hello, get off my ship, etc...(it all has to do with the tone in which
it is said).

I wish to make sure that I am dealing with a true friend and partner
that understand me and my ways.  I spend much time at sea alone and
comradeship is very important to me.

Aargh,
Jack

PS I don't understand your phrase "keep feet" either, but I don't give
you a hard time about it.
messages.raw:
Jack insists on Pirate-speak.

Jack Sparrow

Sun, 3 Apr 2005

Prince me matey,

I do not feel I can continue this patch unless I have a true partner. Me Matey is a greeting which we Caribbean sailors use for close friends and crew, and "Aargh" can be used in many ways, including goodbye, hello, get off my ship, etc...(it all has to do with the tone in which it is said).

I wish to make sure that I am dealing with a true friend and partner that understand me and my ways. I spend much time at sea alone and comradeship is very important to me.

Aargh,
Jack

PS I don't understand your phrase "keep feet" either, but I don't give you a hard time about it.

"victory_chember victory_chember" <victory_chembers@lawyer.com>
        
Attention Mr Jack Sparrow, Notice 

Attention Mr,Jack Sparrow,

I am in reciept of the file your bank forwarded to my chambers this
morning.I will be very happy to work for you, if only you will do as i
instruct you and do what ever i told you to do without complain for your
own good,

I am Barrister Ibrahim Mohammed principal attorney Victory Chamber
Inc.And accredited financier attorney with your Bank.

If it pleases you I will stand for you in the court and obtain all this
entire documents the bank ask from you on your behalf and stand to sign
the release order of your fund and as well legalized the transfer of
your fund in to your account.

1)Approval certificate from ministry of finance
2)Certificate of fund legality from ministry of justice
3)Affidevit of aoth from High Court of Justice 

Immediately you receive this mail pleaes tell me if it will please your
majesty if i work for you on your response toward this mail I will
verify what it will takes for me to get the entire documents.

Thanks i am here to serve you better.

Yours in service

Barrister Mohammed Ibrahim (ESQ)
principal attorney
VICTORY CHAMBERS ABIDJAN COTE D'IVOIRE

messages.body:
Fri, 8 Apr 2005  
   
"prince bankole"
 
Aargh,

Me mate?  Have ye forgotten that ye are me mate?  Ye no longer call me
mate, and do not say aargh.  I think ye be losin it.  The stress be
gettin to ya?

I be movin back out to sea tomorrow, to a small island called Areola
where a ship is about to go down.  I can salvage much from this wreck. 
I may need to help her become a wreck, just a little.

So I be wonderin what ye want me to do?  Ye do not want me to cut this
man in, but what then?

Jack

Please do not delay this or i will stop them from get this document bucause i will not like to be in barras ok
Thanks yours in service
Barrister Ibrahim Mohammed

messages.body:
Mon, 11 Apr 2005  
 

Mr. Moe, 

I get de money, don't worry.  Please wait for just a day or so, it be
comin. Do not stop de documents right now.  Perhaps ye be able to slow
dem down just a little though?

Jack
messages.raw:
Jack Sparrow

Mon, 11 Apr 2005

Mr. Moe,

I get de money, don't worry. Please wait for just a day or so, it be comin. Do not stop de documents right now. Perhaps ye be able to slow dem down just a little though?

Jack

Jack appeals to Prince for help with the lawyer. Continues to sail around the female anatomy.

messages.body:
Mon, 11 Apr 2005
"prince bankole"


Prince me Matey,

You not be answerin my question.  I salvage a ship this weekend off de
vulva reef - some resistance, but she go down with some encouragement. 
Now I have de goods, but it be a little while before I get dem fenced.

I get de message from de lawyer, and he want some money!  You not be
wantin to cut him in, can you send de money to me so I can give it to
him?  I will hold de landlubber off for a while. But we need to make him
happy to get de money!

And who be Jerry?

Aargh,
Jack
messages.raw:
Jack Sparrow

Mon, 11 Apr 2005
"prince bankole"

Prince me Matey,

You not be answerin my question. I salvage a ship this weekend off de vulva reef - some resistance, but she go down with some encouragement. Now I have de goods, but it be a little while before I get dem fenced.

I get de message from de lawyer, and he want some money! You not be wantin to cut him in, can you send de money to me so I can give it to him? I will hold de landlubber off for a while. But we need to make him happy to get de money!

And who be Jerry?

Aargh,
Jack

Prince says no, Jack's got to send the money.

messages.body:
Wed, 13 Apr 2005  
   
Dear Friend Jack Sparrow 

please as you can see all eye in in every one in the office i can not
transfer any money from this bank you know here all westner union is in
the bank and money gram please saver me from this i do not want to loose
my job and you know i have family please do this favour for me ok
after this i will pay you back in less than time,Jerry is my nephew in
the house
thanks and remain bless

Prince Bankole

Wed, 13 Apr 2005

Dear Friend Jack Sparrow

please as you can see all eye in in every one in the office i can not transfer any money from this bank you know here all westner union is in the bank and money gram please saver me from this i do not want to loose my job and you know i have family please do this favour for me ok after this i will pay you back in less than time,Jerry is my nephew in the house

messages.body:
Wed, 13 Apr 2005   

Ah me mate, 

I be so disappointed with you.  I thought you be my friend and cohort,
but ye do not call me mate. Be you a partner with Jerry, is that why he
be sendin me messages? Can he be helpin with the money?

I be fencin my goods today, but de money will not be enough.  I need you
to be sendin me de money.  You need to go to de other bank or de other
place to do de money transfer. Maybe Jerry can send de money. I only be
able to get maybe $1,000 for de latest haul. To get more, I must salvage
another ship.

If I fence de goods today, I be goin out to de islands dey call de inner
cervix.  It be deep within de archipelago, but some good salvage be had
there.

Yo ho,
Jack
messages.raw:
Jack Sparrow

Wed, 13 Apr 2005

Ah me mate,

I be so disappointed with you. I thought you be my friend and cohort, but ye do not call me mate. Be you a partner with Jerry, is that why he be sendin me messages? Can he be helpin with the money?

I be fencin my goods today, but de money will not be enough. I need you to be sendin me de money. You need to go to de other bank or de other place to do de money transfer. Maybe Jerry can send de money. I only be able to get maybe $1,000 for de latest haul. To get more, I must salvage another ship.

If I fence de goods today, I be goin out to de islands dey call de inner cervix. It be deep within de archipelago, but some good salvage be had there.

Yo ho,
Jack

Prince me matey,

Jack

messages.body:
Mon, 18 Apr 2005


Oh, Mr. Mohammed,

I soo sorry I no got de money right now.  I lost it all, but do not
worry.  I be getting more money this week.  I just need to go salvage a
vessel this week. I be gettin de money, can you hold on for just a few
days?

Jack
messages.raw:
Hang on! Jack will get the money!

Jack Sparrow

Mon, 18 Apr 2005

Oh, Mr. Mohammed,

I soo sorry I no got de money right now. I lost it all, but do not worry. I be getting more money this week. I just need to go salvage a vessel this week. I be gettin de money, can you hold on for just a few days?

messages.body:
Mon, 18 Apr 2005 

Prince me matey!

I be some better now.  I think de rum was bad, and de women was badder.

I have de bad situation!  De lawyer, he say he want de money now, and I
do not have it any more! Ye need to send me de money so I can keep him
on board!  I think he willin to accept just $500, can ye send this to
me?

Aargh,
Jack
messages.raw:
At this point, the bank, lawyer and Prince all stop talking to Jack at once, almost as if they were the same person.

Jack Sparrow

Mon, 18 Apr 2005

Prince me matey!

I be some better now. I think de rum was bad, and de women was badder.

I have de bad situation! De lawyer, he say he want de money now, and I do not have it any more! Ye need to send me de money so I can keep him on board! I think he willin to accept just $500, can ye send this to me?

Aargh,
Jack

messages.body:
Thu, 21 Apr 2005

NOT me matey

Ye be a scurvy rat.  Ye be a moldy limb rotting on de dead man.  Ye
started dis deal and ye cut me out of it.  Good thing ye not be here in
de Caribbean, I would keel haul ye and den slit you throat.

ARGH!


  Jack Sparrow
messages.raw:
One last parting shot from Jack, expressing displeasure with Prince.

Jack Sparrow

Thu, 21 Apr 2005

NOT me matey

Ye be a scurvy rat. Ye be a moldy limb rotting on de dead man. Ye started dis deal and ye cut me out of it. Good thing ye not be here in de Caribbean, I would keel haul ye and den slit you throat.

ARGH!

Jack Sparrow
